title: Ladytrader$1
author: Ladytrader$1
content: Hi guys, my name is Lillian Scott and am a crypto expert. Being a crypto expert does not necessarily means staying long in the crypto space but being able to know what would happen next in the crypto community.Three years ago to now I was in my mum's house and was working at a bakery across the street. Until could save enough and buy myself a phone then found more about crypto across the internet. My mind was blown on how crypto functions  which made me back then bought countless courses and join online classes, untill I hacked the matrix. Which was Arbitrage.Cryptocurrency arbitrage is profiting from simultaneously buying a cryptocurrency from an exchange and selling it on a different one with a slightly higher price.Arbitrage means capturing the profit opportunities stemming from the price differences between different markets for an asset.Assume an asset X is traded in two markets, market A and market B. If it is traded at 100 in marketplace A and 105 in marketplace B, one can enjoy a riskless 5% profit opportunity excluding transaction cost.To be able to profit from arbitrage trading in the cryptocurrency market, you should be able to buy and sell cryptocurrencies on multiple exchanges. Also, you should be able to detect and catch the opportunities that appear for a very short period of time.There are also different kind of arbitrage:Miner's arbitrageSpot arbitragePosition arbitrageInterest arbitrageHow to begin cryptocurrency arbitrage trading?To be able to profit from arbitrage trading in the cryptocurrency market, you should be able to buy and sell cryptocurrencies on multiple exchanges. Also, you should be able to detect and catch the opportunities that appear for a very short period of time.There are many advantages of cryptocurrency arbitrage trading compared to other trading strategies.First, the risk related to arbitrage trading is very low. Since you aim to capture price differences between cryptocurrency exchanges simultaneously, you don’t have an open position and hence, the risk is very low.Secondly, no matter what the direction of the prices is, you can make a profit as the price difference can occur while the prices are both decreasing and increasing.Also, you do not need to wait for too long to realise the profit you've capture.To  learn more about crypto currency contact me:: ladytrader100@gmail.com

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: Welcome to the platform. I see from your post you have a bit experience and looks like you are a trader but unfortunately this board is not meant for this topic. Nevertheless, the topic and the content does not ryhme in any way and I would advise you change your topic and  move  it to here.

comments.author: Yawa2020
comments.body: Are you telling us your experience with crypto or you are here to advertise your arbitrage lies? Well, I can figure in your write up that you just disguise to advertise what you are into in a wrong board. I don't know what you aim to achieve but whatever it is, it is better you do it with dignity and besides, I can tell that majority of the arbitrage site are scammers and you might lose your money in the process. Be warn you all!

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: Quote from: Broadanbig on January 06, 2023, 04:02:34 PMWelcome to the platform. I see from your post you have a bit experience and looks like you are a trader but unfortunately this board is not meant for this topic. They probably posted it here cause trust score is not displayed here and the OP has been tagged as a scammer by more than one user[1].Do not email the scammer or enter any sort of dealings with them.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=3433643- Jay -

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: Ladytrader$1 on January 06, 2023, 01:39:38 PMHi guys, my name is Lillian Scott and am a crypto expert. Being a crypto expert does not necessarily means staying long in the crypto space but being able to know what would happen next in the crypto community.<cut>I very much doubt that. If you were really an expert, you'd have a steady job already and wouldn't be trolling the Internet looking for new victims to take advantage of.Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=3433643 NeuroticFish    2022-01-17    Reference    Offers far good to be true "crypto services". YOSHIE    2022-01-12    Reference    This lady uses a scamar based crypto trading service, about Bitcoin via gmail be careful.Be careful with your money.

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Hi, other than trading advice services, do you offer other services as well like do you have onlyfans? I heard the income is much greater and many people are actually adopting it more than crypto. This post might sound funny/trolly, but I am stating sad and bitter facts.No offence to the OP.

comments.author: Zwei
comments.body: Lets do some math, if I make a %5 risk free profit, and I started with a capital of 1000 Dineros, I would have $37,450,725,549,732 by my 500 trade!OP, Thank you for sharing with us the top secret money printing machine.LOL, This shit is so funny to me
